landing.hero.tagline: Smart expense tracking, automated categorization, and powerful budgeting tools. Transform your financial chaos into clarity with Personal CFO.
landing.features.title: Everything You Need to Master Your Money
landing.features.subtitle: From automatic transaction categorization to advanced budgeting, Personal CFO gives you the tools to make informed financial decisions.
landing.features.cards.title: Smart Card Management
landing.features.cards.desc: Connect unlimited cards and track spending across all your accounts in real-time.
landing.features.categorization.title: Auto-Categorization
landing.features.categorization.desc: Deterministic, user-defined keyword rules categorize transactions. Include/exclude rules supported; unmatched stay 'Uncategorized'.
landing.features.budgeting.title: Advanced Budgeting
landing.features.budgeting.desc: Set spending limits, track progress, and get alerts when you're approaching your budget.
landing.features.alerts.title: Smart Alerts
landing.features.alerts.desc: Get notified about payment due dates, unusual spending, and budget overruns.
landing.features.import.title: Bank Statement Import
landing.features.import.desc: Upload and process bank statements automatically with intelligent transaction parsing.
landing.features.analytics.title: Spending Analytics
landing.features.analytics.desc: Visualize your spending patterns with detailed charts and monthly/weekly breakdowns.
landing.cta.sectionTitle: Ready to take control of your finances?
landing.cta.sectionSubtitle: Join thousands who transformed their finances with Personal CFO. Get started free today.
landing.cta.footer: Bank-level security • Free forever • Upgrade anytime
landing.pricing.title: Choose Your Perfect Plan
landing.pricing.subtitle: Start free and upgrade as your financial management needs grow. All plans include our core features.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.sections.1.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.sections.1.p1: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, add financial data, or contact us for support.
privacy.sections.2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.sections.2.p1: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.sections.2.li1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy.sections.2.li2: Process transactions and send related information
privacy.sections.2.li4: Send technical notices and security alerts
privacy.sections.3.title: 3. Information Sharing
privacy.sections.3.p1: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:
privacy.sections.3.li3: To protect our rights and safety
privacy.sections.3.li4: In connection with a business transfer
privacy.sections.4.title: 4. Data Security
privacy.sections.4.p1: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information:
privacy.sections.5.title: 5. Data Retention
privacy.sections.5.p1: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. You may request deletion of your account and data at any time.
privacy.sections.6.title: 6. Your Rights
privacy.sections.7.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
privacy.sections.7.p1: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences. We do not use tracking cookies for advertising purposes.
privacy.sections.8.title: 8. Changes to Privacy Policy
privacy.sections.8.p1: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by email or through our service.
privacy.sections.9.title: 9. Contact Us
privacy.sections.9.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@personalcfo.com.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.sections.1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.sections.1.p1: By accessing and using PersonalCFO ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.sections.2.title: 2. Description of Service
terms.sections.2.p1: PersonalCFO is a personal finance management application that helps users track expenses, manage budgets, and analyze spending patterns. The service includes:
terms.sections.3.title: 3. User Accounts
terms.sections.3.p1: You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for maintaining the confidentiality of your account. You agree not to disclose your password to any third party and to take sole responsibility for activities that occur under your account.
terms.sections.4.title: 4. Privacy and Data Security
terms.sections.4.p1: We take your privacy seriously. All financial data is encrypted and stored securely. We do not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, except as required by law.
terms.sections.5.title: 5. Acceptable Use
terms.sections.5.p1: You agree to use PersonalCFO only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
terms.sections.5.li1: Use the service for any illegal activities
terms.sections.5.li2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
terms.sections.5.li3: Upload malicious code or attempt to disrupt the service
terms.sections.5.li4: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
terms.sections.6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
terms.sections.6.p1: PersonalCFO is provided "as is" without any warranties. We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of your use of the service.
terms.sections.7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
terms.sections.7.p1: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the application.
terms.sections.8.title: 8. Contact Information
terms.sections.8.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@personalcfo.com.
